entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
